title: Gas tycoon 2 v3.0 IOS For IPhone IPad
description:
*** UNLOCKED ALL LEVEL PACKS *** 
*** INCLUDED 8 VISUAL THEMES *** 
*** NO NEED ANY PAYMENTS IN THE GAME *** 
*** NO ADVERTISING ***

Gas tycoon 2 is a fun pipe puzzle game, perfect for those situations where you need to kill time. You have to connect all sources to objects. Rotate the items you will need to reconnect each object. At first glance, it seems simple, but with each level of play becomes more difficult. There are a total of 385 levels available. You are challenged by leaderboard system as well as timed against the clock. The controls for game use simple tap gestures that are very responsive. Pipes rotate a full 360 degrees and can be activated at any time.

Features: 
- A lot of themes;
- A lot of levels;
- Sync your progress through iCloud, between devices and games with a different theme design
